title: FS: 12 card raw T206 lot - $300 or BO
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: 12 card raw T206 lot - $300 or BO
posts.post_content:
Asking $300 delivered; standard paypal preferred.  All exhibit some sort of flaw that would prevent it from grading SGC 40 (in my opinion):

Joe Birmingham - trimmed
Bill Clymer - 'dimpling' not visible on scan
Patsy Dougherty (Portrait)
Jack Dunn
Cecil Ferguson - trimmed
Wilbur Goode
Frank King
Clyde Milan
Francis (Big Jeff) Pfeffer
Claude Ritchey
George Stovall (Portrait)
Ira Thomas - wrinkle through chest
